p: Death with a functioning graft (DWFG) occurred in five (8%) patients after a median follow-up of 318 (IQR: 292â€“341) months post-transplantation. Causes of DWFG were infection (n=2), acute liver failure (n=1), and undetermined (n=2). Two of the DWGF developed clinical hepatic disease in the post-transplantation period.
